# TEMM

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This is an R package to implement the Tensor Envelope Mixture Model (TEMM) for the paper "Tensor Envelope Mixture Model For Simultaneous Clustering and Multiway Dimension Reduction" by Deng and Zhang.

## Installation

The [TEMM] package can be installed, directly from [GitHub](https://github.com/), using the “devtools” library:

``` r
install.packages("devtools")
library(devtools)
devtools::install_github("azuryee/TEMM")
library(TEMM)
```
